name: Renewable Resources And Non Renewable Resources
name_original: Renewable Resources And Non Renewable Resources
description:
This game is my first game that doesn't need scratch or kodu but ren'py.

The game is an educational experience about Renewable Resources And Non-Renewable Resources or RRANRR for short.

Also, check out my youtube channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQ8GFM7X4QonMCZ7fDzvncQ/videos
